events.title: Ohsem Food Festival Melaka
events.description: A 4-day food and music festival with delicious eats and live performances from Kristal-X, Kazim Band, and One Avenue Band. Open 10 AM – 12 Midnight.

events.title: Open Till Dawn · Ipoh Greenery Market
events.description: A rainy night market filled with warmth and music. Street performers sang in the rain, vendors kept their stalls alive, and visitors enjoyed hot food under umbrellas. More than just a market — it was a shared story of resilience, connection, and joy.

events.title: Penang Street Food Festival 2025
events.location: Tapak Parkir Landscape A, Prangin Mall, Penang
events.description: 6 days of nonstop street food and entertainment in Penang! Enjoy viral street food, artist booths, guest performances, games, and TikTok reviews. Daily from 12 PM – 12 Midnight. The ultimate food & entertainment fiesta for family and friends.

events.title: Havoc Merdeka Food Festival 2025
events.description: Celebrate Merdeka at Havoc Food Festival! Featuring 160 trending food vendors, 40 artists & influencers, family activities, and big prizes — including a scooter giveaway. Free entry, from 11 AM to 12 Midnight daily.

events.title: Merdeka Day Greenery Market
events.location: Hugh‘s Ipoh (opposite Yuk Choy Primary School)
events.description: Celebrate Malaysia’s Independence Day with a vibrant market! Highlights include 90+ curated stalls, live busker performances, kids’ colouring contest, face painting, DIY flag workshop, dining area, promo deals, and a family-friendly, pet-friendly atmosphere.
